faqs.question: Can I request a specific design or character for the cake?
faqs.answer: Yes, decorators specialize in custom themes and can bring your vision to life, including characters, logos, or intricate fondant work.

faqs.question: Do decorators accommodate special dietary needs?
faqs.answer: Many do! Options such as eggless, vegan, and gluten-free are available—just mention your requirements during your request.
